alert.note: Alert for Arlington, Falls Church, Alexandria; Fairfax; Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Southern Fauquier; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:41AM EST until January 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of up to two inches, with locally higher amounts of up to 3 to 4 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of The District of Columbia, central, northern and southern Maryland and central and northern Virginia. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will initially start as rain, and then switch over to snow during the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Arlington, Falls Church, Alexandria; Fairfax; Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Southern Fauquier; Spotsylvania; Stafford
